item.title: Beth add a quote by Kevin Hearne
item.description: "Yer a good lad, Atticus, mowin’ me lawn and killin’ what Brits come around." -- Kevin Hearne

item.title: Beth add a quote by Kevin Hearne
item.description: "Ye know what me Sean used to say, God rest his soul? He said, 'A friend will help ye move, Katie, but a really good friend will help ye move a body." -- Kevin Hearne

item.title: Beth add a quote by Kevin Hearne
item.description: "Wooo!’ he said, slamming his shot glass down and coughing a bit. ‘That’s good stuff.’ I agreed heartily. ‘Shall we do another one?’ I asked. ‘Oh no,’ Jesus said quietly, his eyes growing round. ‘This is one of those situations where I have to stop and ask myself, what would I do?" -- Kevin Hearne

item.title: Beth add a quote by Kevin Hearne
Beth add a quote by Kevin Hearne
item.description: "When in doubt, blame the dark elves." -- Kevin Hearne

item.title: Beth add a quote by Kevin Hearne
item.description: "Tell her I am Peace Dawg but I think her cats are closely allied with The Man. I'm going to stick it to them." -- Kevin Hearne

item.title: Beth add a quote by Gay Hendricks
item.description: "Wherever I go, may I learn and love as much as I can in every moment. Wherever I am, may I be open to inspiration and truth." -- Gay Hendricks
